c.x: "Appellate Court" shall mean the appellate court as designated in 2 LCOTCL
"Arrest Warrant" shall mean an order in writing issued by a tribal judge di
"Citizen" shall mean those persons whom are currently citizens (members) of
"Clerk of Court" shall mean an officer of the Tribal Court who has charge o
"Complaint" shall mean a formal, written allegation against a party.
"Juvenile" shall mean any individual less than eighteen (18) years of age.
"Reservation" or "Reservation Lands" means those lands, including the beds
"Subpoena" shall mean a writ commanding the designated person to appear and
"Search Warrant" shall mean an order in writing issued by a tribal judge di
"Tribal Court" shall mean the duly constituted court of the Lac Courte Orei
"Tribal Governing Board" shall be the duly constituted Tribal Governing Boa
"Tribal Law Enforcement Officer" shall mean any personnel who currently is
"Tribe" shall mean the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa I
